name: MediQuest
description:
Your poor grandma is sick and she needs you to retrieve a very strong medicine for her. You must go on a quest to find it and bring it back. She has given you a teleportation totem and stone, so that if you fall to danger, you will be resurrected. But you can only place the resurrection point once.

Created for Ludum Dare 28 in December 2013. Linux build coming as soon as we figure out the automated build process.
